testsuite.name: Feature: Navigate the menu and add an item to the cart
Scenario: Use the menu to reach the correct category, then add item to cart

testcase.name: Given user navigates to the online store
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use the menu to reach the correct category, then add item to cart

testcase.name: When you use navigation menu to reach evening dresses
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use the menu to reach the correct category, then add item to cart

testcase.name: Then you will be on the evening dresses page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use the menu to reach the correct category, then add item to cart

testcase.name: When you add printed dress to the cart
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use the menu to reach the correct category, then add item to cart

testcase.name: Then printed dress should be in cart
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use the menu to reach the correct category, then add item to cart

testsuite.name: Scenario: After you add an item to cart, the cart should have the correct number of items

testcase.name: Given the user navigates to the online store
testcase.classname: Scenario: After you add an item to cart, the cart should have the correct number of items

testcase.name: When the user clicks on an item
testcase.classname: Scenario: After you add an item to cart, the cart should have the correct number of items

testcase.name: Then the page for that item should open
testcase.classname: Scenario: After you add an item to cart, the cart should have the correct number of items

testcase.name: When you add an item to cart
testcase.classname: Scenario: After you add an item to cart, the cart should have the correct number of items

testcase.name: Then the cart should now have that item
testcase.classname: Scenario: After you add an item to cart, the cart should have the correct number of items

testcase.name: When you add a second item to cart
testcase.classname: Scenario: After you add an item to cart, the cart should have the correct number of items

testcase.name: Then the cart should have both items
testcase.classname: Scenario: After you add an item to cart, the cart should have the correct number of items
